description.narrative: We have already done a pilot project with our partner organization LDLU, and now wish to develop our internal partnership to form a more transparent working process The main objective is to have LDLU form an official project group separated from the top management of the organisation, and work with them to form the visions of our future cooperation Therefore, the target group is also members of LDLU, and specifically the project group The main activity is a three day workshop in Copenhagen, with the entire project group, consisting of all project group members from VU, RU and LDLU The aim of the workshops is both to get to know each other better, discuss visions for our countries and for our specific work together, as well as discussing how we best cooperate internally and make the strongest impact on Ukrainian society

participating-org.narrative: RU & VU - Radikal Ungdom & Venstre Ungdom
